PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-11952024-11-08VAC
ActVeterans Review and Appeal Board Act
PrecisAppointment of VALÉRIE DESCHÊNES of Longueuil, Quebec, to be a temporary member of the Veterans Review and Appeal Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of two years, effective January 16, 2025.
